newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Sri Lanka tenders to buy June 1-2 gas oil, jet.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka tenders to buy June 1-2 gas oil, jet.

text.p: Sri Lanka's state-owned Ceylon Petroleum Corp (CPC) has issued a tender to buy 250,000 barrels of gas oil and 50,000 barrels of jet fuel for June 1-2 delivery, industry sources said on Thursday.
The tender seeks 1.0-percent sulphur gas oil. The combination cargo is for delivery to Colombo on a cost-anf-freight (c-and-f) basis.
The tender closes on May 14 and offers will be vaild until May 16.

In its last tender, CPC bought by tender from Glencore 230,000 barrels of gas oil and 40,000 of 95-octane leaded gasoline at 38 cents per barrel and $1.85 per barrel above Singapore quotes spot, respectively, for May 21-22 delivery.
